    window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
        FB.init({
            appId      : '149930111837309',
            xfbml      : true,
            version    : 'v2.6'
        });
        FB.Event.subscribe('message.send', function (targetUrl) {
            _gaq.push(['_trackSocial', 'facebook', 'send', targetUrl]);
        });
    };

    (function(d, s, id){
        var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
        if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
        js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
        js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js";
        fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
    }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
</script>

                        <li class="user-not-logged-in divider"></li>

                    </ul>
                </div>

            </div>

            var soc_products = [{"item_id":178232,"main_categories_id":13,"elefant_sku":"d4fda03b-3f81-4489-9654-3bef5ee4996b","quantity":1,"price_elefant":"439.99","name":"Apa de parfum Christian Dior J adore, 100 ml, Pentru Femei","info":"Christian Dior","stock":"263","type":"1","w_stock":"30","image":"http:\/\/www.elefant.ro\/res\/img\/fashion\/40\/32\/1\/images\/apa-de-parfum-christian-dior-j-adore-100-ml-pentru-femei_355_2.jpg","url":"\/cosmetice-si-parfumuri\/parfumuri\/apa-de-parfum\/apa-de-parfum-christian-dior-j-adore-iii-ml-pentru-femei-incolor-40321-355.html","extra_item_id":{"item_id":"40321","color_id":"355","main_categories_id":15},"selling_unit_price":"439.99"}];
            for (var index in soc_products) {
                if (soc_products.hasOwnProperty(index) &amp;&amp; soc_products[index].main_categories_id &amp;&amp; soc_products[index].item_id) {

                    var identifier = '';
                    if (soc_products[index].extra_item_id) {
                        identifier += soc_products[index].extra_item_id.main_categories_id  + '-' + soc_products[index].extra_item_id.item_id + '-' + soc_products[index].extra_item_id.color_id;
                    } else {
                        identifier += soc_products[index].main_categories_id + '-' + soc_products[index].item_id;
                    }

                    var product = {
                        identifier: identifier,
                        amount: soc_products[index].price_elefant,
                        currency: 'RON',
                        quantity: soc_products[index].quantity
                    };

                    if (basket &amp;&amp; basket.products) {
                        basket.products.push(product);
                    } else {
                        var basket = {products: []};
                        basket.products.push(product);
                    }
                }
            }
        </script>

    <div class="close"> </div>
    <div class="blue_box"> </div>
    <div class="title_blue_box">
        <strong>Deschizi coletul</strong> inainte de plata
    </div>
    <div class="description_blue_box">
        Pentru a te asigura ca ai primit exact ce ai comandat, ai posibilitatea sa deschizi coletul la livrare si sa verifici continutul acestuia inainte de plata.
        <br /><br />
        In cazul in care ai platit online si vrei sa returnezi coletul, te asiguram ca iti vom returna suma achitata in cel mai scurt timp posibil.

<script>
    var z="";function verify(a,b,c,d){b=b.replace(/|-|./gi,"");var e=new RegExp("\s","g");b=b.replace(e,"");if(!z.closed&amp;&amp;z.location){z.location.href=encodeUrl(a)}else{z=window.open(encodeUrl(a),b,"location=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, toolbar=no, menubar=no, width="+c+", height="+d);if(!z.opener)z.opener=self}if(window.focus){z.focus()}}function encodeUrl(a){if(a.indexOf("?")&gt;0){encodedParams="?";parts=a.split("?");params=parts[1].split("&amp;");for(i=0;i&lt;params.length;i++){if(i&gt;0){encodedParams+="&amp;"}if(params[i].indexOf("=")&gt;0){p=params[i].split("=");encodedParams+=(p[0]+"="+escape(encodeURI(p[1])))}else{encodedParams+=params[i]}}a=parts[0]+encodedParams}return a}
</script>
    <!--Segment.com-->
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function getCookie(c_name){
            var c_value = document.cookie;
            var c_start = c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
            if (c_start == -1){ c_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");}
            if (c_start == -1){ c_value = null; } else { c_start = c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1; var c_end = c_value.indexOf(";", c_start); if (c_end == -1) {c_end = c_value.length;} c_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));}
            return c_value;
        }
        !function(){var analytics=window.analytics=window.analytics||[];if(!analytics.initialize)if(analytics.invoked)window.console&amp;&amp;console.error&amp;&amp;console.error("Segment snippet included twice.");else{analytics.invoked=!0;analytics.methods=["trackSubmit","trackClick","trackLink","trackForm","pageview","identify","reset","group","track","ready","alias","debug","page","once","off","on"];analytics.factory=function(t){return function(){var e=Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);e.unshift(t);analytics.push(e);return analytics}};for(var t=0;t&lt;analytics.methods.length;t++){var e=analytics.methods[t];analytics[e]=analytics.factory(e)}analytics.load=function(t){var e=document.createElement("script");e.type="text/javascript";e.async=!0;e.src=("https:"===document.location.protocol?"https://":"http://")+"cdn.segment.com/analytics.js/v1/"+t+"/analytics.min.js";var n=document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];n.parentNode.insertBefore(e,n)};analytics.SNIPPET_VERSION="4.0.0";
            analytics.load("LsXCphaq735dhwcTJ7M98UCMUcPUA3IS");
            var userId = getCookie('user-email');
            if (userId &amp;&amp; userId.length &gt; 0) {
                analytics.identify(userId);
            }
            analytics.page();
        }}();
    </script>

<div id="dialog"></div>


    
<script type="text/javascript">
    window.cookieconsent_options = {
        "message":"Acest site foloseste cookies. Continuarea navigarii presupune ca esti de acord cu utilizarea cookie-urilor.",
        "dismiss":"Am inteles",
        "learnMore":"Afla detalii",
        "link":'http://www.elefant.ro/pagini/politica-cookie-uri-178.html',

        "domain": window.location.host.indexOf('stag') != -1 ? window.location.hostname : "elefant.ro"

data-state="consent">                            <p class="_hj-f5b2a1eb-9b07_widget_title">Iti multumim pentru feedback!</p>                            <div class="_hj-f5b2a1eb-9b07_widget_content">                                <p class="_hj-f5b2a1eb-9b07_consent_message_text">Connecting your feedback with data related to your visits (device-specific, usage data, cookies, behavior and interactions) will help us improve faster. Do you give us your consent to do so for your previous and future visits? <a class="_hj-f5b2a1eb-9b07_more_info_link" href="http://www.hotjarconsent.com/" target="_blank">More information</a></p>
